title: Create setup.py file
description: Create a Python setup file to manage project dependencies.

title: Initialize virtual environment
description: Use venv module to create and activate a virtual environment for the project.

title: Install dependencies
description: Install required Python packages such as PyTorch, OpenCV, etc.

title: Set up data preprocessing
description: Implement data preprocessing and augmentation using PyTorch datasets.

title: Create main.py file
description: Develop the frontend of a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) model for image processing.

title: Integrate backend components
description: Implement the CNN model and dataset handling in the backend.

title: Write unit tests
description: Create comprehensive unit tests for each module of the project.

title: Run integration tests
description: Perform end-to-end testing to ensure frontend and backend integration works as expected.

title: Set up Docker
description: Create a Docker image of the project for easy deployment.

title: Deploy application
description: Run the application on a web server using Docker.
